author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Aeromexico Reports July 2015 Traffic ResultsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Aeromexico Reports July 2015 Traffic Results
Grupo Aeromexico S.A.B. de C.V. today reported July 2015 operational results.
Grupo Aeromexico transported 1 million 765 thousand passengers in July; a 12.0% year-on-year increase. International passenger numbers increased by 17.1%, while domestic passenger numbers increased by 9.4%. Demand, measured in Revenue Passenger Kilometers (RPKs), increased by 13.0%, year-on-year. Aeromexico’s capacity, measured in Available Seat Kilometers (ASKs), increased by 8.9% year-on-year. Aeromexico’s July load factor was 87.2%. July

The information included within this report has not been audited and does not provide information on the Company’s future performance. Aeromexico’s future performance depends on many factors and it cannot be inferred that any period’s performance or its year-over-year comparison will be an indicator of similar future performance.
